featuredProjects.title: AI-Powered SaaS Content Editor
featuredProjects.description: Core feature development for an unreleased SaaS product with AI-driven content editing capabilities using GPT-based models. Enables users to generate, edit, and optimize content for media, social media, and blog posts with a seamless and responsive user interface.

featuredProjects.title: University Enterprise Information Systems
featuredProjects.description: Designed and maintained 10+ web applications for various BYU-Hawaii departments using Mendix low-code platform and Oracle DB. Developed REST APIs using ASP.NET in C# with Docker containers to streamline database access for non-backend engineers.

featuredProjects.title: Notion Database Application
featuredProjects.description: Web application that integrates with Notion API to manage and interact with Notion databases, providing enhanced functionality for data management and organization.

allProjects.title: AI-Powered SaaS Content Editor
allProjects.description: Core feature development for an unreleased SaaS product with AI-driven content editing capabilities using GPT-based models. Enables users to generate, edit, and optimize content for media, social media, and blog posts.

allProjects.title: University Enterprise Information Systems
allProjects.description: Designed and maintained 10+ web applications for various BYU-Hawaii departments using Mendix low-code platform and Oracle DB. Developed REST APIs using ASP.NET in C# with Docker containers.

allProjects.title: Notion Database Application
allProjects.description: Web application that integrates with Notion API to manage and interact with Notion databases, providing enhanced functionality for data management and organization.

allProjects.title: Script Translation API
allProjects.description: API service that translates scripts and text content between multiple languages, streamlining multilingual content creation workflows for developers and content creators.

allProjects.title: Tango Learning App with Notion
allProjects.description: Language learning application integrated with Notion for vocabulary management. Helps users study Japanese efficiently with organized word lists and spaced repetition techniques.

allProjects.title: Scripture Collection App
allProjects.description: Web application for collecting and organizing scripture references. Built with HTML and frontend technologies for easy access and management of religious texts.
